description: Single storey, part two storey side extension, following demolition of existing side addition; relocation of the main entrance door; rear roof extension, and installation of two roof lights to side roof slope.
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings: red line site plan P001 Rev_ Site and location plan;  P002 Rev_ Block and location plan;  P010 Rev Ground floor plan existing; P011 Rev First floor plan existing; P012 Rev Roof plan existing; P020 Rev Front elevation existing; P021 Rev Rear elevation existing; P022 Rev Side elevation existing; P023 Rev Side elevation existing; P100 Rev_A Ground floor plan proposed; P101 Rev_A First floor plan proposed; P102 Rev_B Second floor plan proposed; P103 Rev_B Roof plan proposed; P200 Rev_A Front elevation proposed; P201 Rev_B Rear elevation proposed; P202 Rev_A Side elevation proposed; P203 Rev_A Side elevation proposed; P220 Rev_A Front elevation proposed materials details; P221 Rev_A Rear elevation proposed materials details;

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning. | All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those detailed within the approved drawings listed under condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
